name: capacities
title: Capacities
description: Interact with Capacities from your command bar. Search your notes, capture content & more.
author: steffenble

preferences.name: bearerToken
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your personal API key to access Capacities API. It can be created in the app settings.

commands.name: open-spaces
commands.title: Open Space
commands.description: Open a space in the Capacities app

commands.name: save-to-daily-note
commands.title: Save to Daily Note
commands.description: Saves a text to today's daily note in Capacities. The text can be formatted in markdown.

commands.name: load-space-info
commands.title: Synchronize Data
commands.description: If your spaces or object types are outdated, you can reload them with this command.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
